lead_paragraph: The Philippines police chief announced the re-launch on Monday of police anti-narcotics operations he hoped would be less bloody, "or even bloodless", entering a new phase in a war on drugs that has caused international alarm.
snippet: The Philippines police chief announced the re-launch on Monday of police anti-narcotics operations he hoped would be less bloody, "or even bloodless", entering a new phase in a war on drugs that has caused international alarm....

headline.main: U.S. Detects North Korean Missile Launch, No Threat to North America
headline.print_headline: U.S. Detects North Korean Missile Launch, No Threat to North America
